hero_section.title2: ⴰⴽⴽⴰⵡ ⵏⴻⴰⴳⵔⵉⴻⴷ ⴻⴷⴷ ⴻⵏ ⵉⵙⵉⵣⵉⴳ ⵏ ⵉⵙⴰⴳⵔⴻⴳ

data.title: Pedagogical Excellence:
data.description: Our team of industry experts provides flexible, practical and up-to-date training on real-world projects, which will allow you to acquire concrete skills that are sought after by employers.

data.title: Unlimited career opportunities:
data.description: You offer the opportunity to access a wide range of professional opportunities in the field you are passionate about.

data.title: Community and network:
data.description: You join a dynamic community of learners and experts in the field. You will have the opportunity to work collaboratively with other participants, share your ideas and forge strong professional ties, a key factor for your future success.

data.title: Individual coaching:
data.description: Benefit from tailored support to help you meet challenges, achieve your goals and maximize your potential throughout your journey.

data.title: Ambitious students:
data.description: Students who wish to actively prepare for success in the digital field will find an opportunity to develop practical skills and gain practical experience.

data.title: Enterprise Teams:
data.description: Companies can enroll their teams in the program to develop internal skills, improve performance and stay competitive in an ever-changing business environment.

data.title: Aspiring Contractors:
data.description: Individuals with entrepreneurial ideas to start businesses can use their digital knowledge to create and successfully manage their projects.

data.title: Transitioning Professionals:
data.description: People who are looking to reorient themselves towards the digital field or to evolve their career path can benefit from our program to quickly acquire the necessary skills and succeed in their professional transition.

data.title: E-commerce
data.description: Explore the world of online commerce with our program. Learn the basics of online store management, digital marketing strategies and online sales... etc.

data.title: graphic design
data.description: Immerse yourself in visual creativity. This introductory program will allow you to learn the fundamentals of graphic design, the principles of composition and the use of popular design tools.

data.title: graphic animation
data.description: Bring your ideas to life through movement. Discover the basics of graphic animation and learn how to create captivating and dynamic visual sequences.

data.title: MERN Stack Development
data.description: Take web development to the next level. This intermediate program immerses you in the development with the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React and Node.js) to create modern web applications.

data.title: Web development
data.description: Dive into the world of web development by getting the skills to create modern and responsive websites, from design to go live.

data.title: mobile development
data.description: Explore mobile app development with Flutter. This beginner program guides you in using Dart and Flutter to create smooth and responsive apps for iOS and Android platforms.
